text: Miles from Nowhere may refer to: ==Books== *Miles from Nowhere, travel adventure by Barbara Savage 1983 *Miles from Nowhere, novel by Nami Mun 2009 ==Film and TV== *Miles from Nowhere (1992 film), directed by Buzz Kulik Starring Ricky Schroder, James Farentino *Miles from Nowhere (2009 film), VHS and DVD release title of TV movie Chasing a Dream with Treat Williams ==Music== *Miles from Nowhere (The Smithereens song) *"Miles from Nowhere", song by Cat Stevens (on the album Tea for the Tillerman)
title: Miles from Nowhere
